remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要繪製Windows 在表單上，您應該使用其中一個方法。To draw an on a Windows Form, you should use one of the methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例被設計用於搭配 Windows Form 中。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms. 是的處理常式事件。It is a handler for the event. A物件傳遞給事件，以及用來在表單上繪製影像。A object is passed to the event and is used to draw the image on the form. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從名為 SampImag.jpg 檔案建立映像。Creates an image from a file named SampImag.jpg. 這個檔案必須位於與應用程式可執行檔相同的資料夾。This file must be located in the same folder as the application executable file. - 建立要繪製影像的左上角的點。Creates a point at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image. - 在表單上繪製無縮放的影像。Draws the unscaled image on the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回多重框架影像，有兩種樣式的相關資訊： 多個網頁和多個解決方式。This method returns information about multiple-frame images, which come in two styles: multiple page and multiple resolution. 多頁影像是包含多個映像。A multiple-page image is an image that contains more than one image. 每個頁面包含單一的 「 影像 」 （或稱 「 框架 」）。Each page contains a single image (or frame). 通常，這些頁面 （或映像或框架） 會顯示在連續以產生動畫的順序，例如動畫的.gif 檔案。These pages (or images, or frames) are typically displayed in succession to produce an animated sequence, such as an animated .gif file. 多個高解析度影像是影像的包含多個複本不同解析度。A multiple-resolution image is an image that contains more than one copy of an image at different resolutions. 這通常會使用其中顯示的影像的大小會決定用於繪製影像的解析度 MIP 對應方式。This is commonly used by MIP mapping where the displayed image size determines the resolution of the image used for drawing. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 可支援任意數目的頁面 （或映像或框架），以及任意數量的解決方式。 can support an arbitrary number of pages (or images, or frames), as well as an arbitrary number of resolutions. 定義的維度是屬性。The defined dimensions are properties of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Managed GDI + 具有內建編碼器和解碼器支援下列檔案類型：Managed GDI+ has built-in encoders and decoders that support the following file types: - BMPBMP - GIFGIF - JPEGJPEG - PNGPNG - TIFFTIFF 檔案仍會鎖定，直到處置。The file remains locked until the is disposed. 如果檔案沒有有效的影像格式或者[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]不支援的像素格式的檔案，這個方法會擲回例外狀況。If the file does not have a valid image format or if [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] does not support the pixel format of the file, this method throws an exception. > [!NOTE] > 類別不支援 alpha 透明點陣圖中。The class does not support alpha transparency in bitmaps. 若要啟用 alpha 透明，使用每像素 32 位元中的 PNG 影像。To enable alpha transparency, use PNG images with 32 bits per pixel. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and methods. 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 若要執行此範例中，將它貼到表單，並處理表單的藉由呼叫事件`DemonstratePropertyItem`方法，傳遞`e`為。To run this example, paste it into a form, and handle the form's event by calling the `DemonstratePropertyItem` method, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回多重框架影像，有兩種樣式的相關資訊： 多個網頁和多個解決方式。This method returns information about multiple-frame images, which come in two styles: multiple page and multiple resolution. 多頁影像是包含多個映像。A multiple-page image is an image that contains more than one image. 每個頁面包含單一的 「 影像 」 （或稱 「 框架 」）。Each page contains a single image (or frame). 通常，這些頁面 （或映像或框架） 會顯示在連續以產生動畫的順序，例如動畫的.gif 檔案。These pages (or images, or frames) are typically displayed in succession to produce an animated sequence, such as an animated .gif file. 多個高解析度影像是影像的包含多個複本不同解析度。A multiple-resolution image is an image that contains more than one copy of an image at different resolutions. 這通常會使用其中顯示的影像的大小會決定用於繪製影像的解析度 MIP 對應方式。This is commonly used by MIP mapping where the displayed image size determines the resolution of the image used for drawing. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 可支援任意數目的頁面 （或映像或框架），以及任意數量的解決方式。 can support an arbitrary number of pages (or images, or frames), as well as an arbitrary number of resolutions. 定義的維度是屬性。The defined dimensions are properties of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有編碼器存在的映像的檔案格式，則會使用可攜式網路圖形 (PNG) 編碼器。If no encoder exists for the file format of the image, the Portable Network Graphics (PNG) encoder is used. 當您使用方法，將圖形影像儲存為 Windows 中繼檔格式 (WMF) 或增強型中繼檔格式 (EMF) 檔案時，所產生的檔案會另存為可攜式網路圖形 (PNG) 檔。When you use the method to save a graphic image as a Windows Metafile Format (WMF) or Enhanced Metafile Format (EMF) file, the resulting file is saved as a Portable Network Graphics (PNG) file. 這是因為[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]元件[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]沒有編碼器可讓您將檔案儲存為.wmf 或.emf 檔案。This behavior occurs because the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] component of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] does not have an encoder that you can use to save files as .wmf or .emf files. 不允許將影像儲存至所建構的相同檔案，並擲回例外狀況。Saving the image to the same file it was constructed from is not allowed and throws an exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method. 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 建立表單，其中包含名為按鈕`Button5`。Create a form that contains a button named `Button5`. 程式碼貼到表單，並將方法關聯按鈕之事件。Paste the code into the form, and associate the method with the button's event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果映像格式不支援屬性項目，這個方法會擲回訊息 「 屬性不支援 」。If the image format does not support property items, this method throws with the message "Property not supported." 如果影像格式支援屬性項目，但不支援您嘗試設定的特定屬性，這個方法會忽略該嘗試，但不會擲回例外狀況。If the image format supports property items but does not support the particular property you are attempting to set, this method ignores the attempt but does not throw an exception. 因為很難設定屬性項目，類別具有沒有公用建構函式。It is difficult to set property items, because the class has no public constructors. 若要解決這項限制的一種方式為取得藉由擷取屬性值或呼叫方法已有此屬性項目。One way to work around this restriction is to obtain a by retrieving the property value or calling the method of an that already has property items. 然後您可以設定的欄位並將它傳遞給。Then you can set the fields of the and pass it to . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and methods. 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 若要執行此範例中，將它貼到表單，並處理表單的藉由呼叫事件`DemonstratePropertyItem`方法，傳遞`e`為。To run this example, paste it into a form, and handle the form's event by calling the `DemonstratePropertyItem` method, passing `e` as .
